Two users encrypted secrets with RSA, unknowingly sharing a prime. Recover the flag from their messages. Ciphertext: 970711628175229686938781606297902704071544202064656477212853186024907822857459640940791607249397593823605368888366981947812687208473806280365265500116898058585461921220628055311419927751716575223802272854227120014943948553890384088

The flag format is flag{...}
n=1165273063134274985309149533604796303358067422867138208581811850637229961229412779393141254855624731908618689795756564577633156551628412599814324831930184354482679324873758670541325036387915454701967886393624805552287521210259462763, n2=995067192274050672851402283313010755515541091121616012641504397085597082119534630156190460347176543620416153393487709554228133171112335471453681788328303955315645597169912568093258761009153601887134156332642537082653377019425064291, e=791459611476720570599268464582328419689801111492231040885906306696138566305873047543850629342959947402684941011987830523636557643115030469217928511304957567702352167322491515044721679587437680101574535100810908664086347948281811421

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{tyyqus2y}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 970711628175229686938781606297902704071544202064656477212853186024907822857459640940791607249397593823605368888366981947812687208473806280365265500116898058585461921220628055311419927751716575223802272854227120014943948553890384088
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=1165273063134274985309149533604796303358067422867138208581811850637229961229412779393141254855624731908618689795756564577633156551628412599814324831930184354482679324873758670541325036387915454701967886393624805552287521210259462763, n2=995067192274050672851402283313010755515541091121616012641504397085597082119534630156190460347176543620416153393487709554228133171112335471453681788328303955315645597169912568093258761009153601887134156332642537082653377019425064291, e=791459611476720570599268464582328419689801111492231040885906306696138566305873047543850629342959947402684941011987830523636557643115030469217928511304957567702352167322491515044721679587437680101574535100810908664086347948281811421
extra_info: p=30406610682277422704928515763066448883785647573429567537574102256631225476721065297856573602804849119828135378214269, q=38323017165917068790980578327063554109208212730326674558438238930213640412865950248764669674832290211227176247147527, q2=32725357083419637535304844733412540200732282247520258362491096197457552148671888501305509940423629029975032792966239, φ(n)=1165273063134274985309149533604796303358067422867138208581811850637229961229412779393141254855624731908618689795756495848005308357136916690720234701927191360622375568631662658200138191522025867686421265150347168412956465898634100968, φ(n2)=995067192274050672851402283313010755515541091121616012641504397085597082119534630156190460347176543620416153393487646422260367474052095238093185309339219437385824647344012502894804672231528208933334994249099308604503573851253883784
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
